name: ucost-discovery-hub
description: UCOST Discovery Hub - Museum Exhibit Management System by Uttarakhand Science and Technology Council

scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND,AI,MBACKEND,OCR -c blue,magenta,green,yellow,cyan "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:ai:core" "npm run dev:mobile-backend" "npm run dev:ocr"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:desktop
scripts.build:desktop: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),cp=require('child_process'); if(fs.existsSync('desktop')){ process.chdir('desktop'); cp.execSync('npm run build',{stdio:'inherit'}); } else { console.log('No desktop dir. Skipping desktop build.'); }"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:ai
scripts.clean:all: rimraf dist node_modules project/*/node_modules project/*/dist desktop/node_modules desktop/dist
scripts.package: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),cp=require('child_process'); if(fs.existsSync('desktop')){ process.chdir('desktop'); cp.execSync('npm run package',{stdio:'inherit'}); } else { console.log('No desktop dir. Skipping desktop package.'); }"
scripts.dist: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),cp=require('child_process'); if(fs.existsSync('desktop')){ process.chdir('desktop'); cp.execSync('npm run dist',{stdio:'inherit'}); } else { console.log('No desktop dir. Skipping desktop dist.'); }"
scripts.create-exe: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),cp=require('child_process'); if(fs.existsSync('desktop')){ process.chdir('desktop'); cp.execSync('npm run create-exe',{stdio:'inherit'}); } else { console.log('No desktop dir. Skipping create-exe.'); }"

author: Uttarakhand Science and Technology Council
